title: buffer
description: A buffer with vertex or index data.

path.description: The URL of the binary buffer.  Relative URLs are relative to the .json file that references the shader.  Instead of referencing an external shader, the URL can also be a base64 data URI.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer in bytes.

name.description: The externally-referenceable globally-unique name of this node.
